T:ServiceStack.Common.Support.InMemoryLogFactory
member.summary:
Note: InMemoryLog keeps all logs in memory, so don't use it long running exceptions
Returns a thread-safe InMemoryLog which you can use while *TESTING* to provide a detailed analysis of your logs.

member.name: T:ServiceStack.Common.UrnId
member.summary:
Creates a Unified Resource Name (URN) with the following formats:
- urn:{TypeName}:{IdFieldValue} e.g. urn:UserSession:1 - urn:{TypeName}:{IdFieldName}:{IdFieldValue} e.g. urn:UserSession:UserId:1
